Several PSA 4 T206 cards for sale:

Jim Scott SC350 SOLD
Ira Thomas SC350 SOLD
Brashear P350 SOLD
Krause P350 (bit of wet sheet transfer on back?) SOLD

$90 each. Shipping is a flat $3 for tracked USPS First Class in a bubble mailer, combined shipping no problem. PP, Venmo, Zelle, Cash App, USPS MO. "x SOLD" or "I'll take x" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.
